mapper.select: select distinct b.company_name from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code where devicetype in ('AA', 'DB', 'HM', 'HM')

select distinct b.group_name from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code
and b.dep_name like '%COB%' and company_name = #{factoryName}

with ta as ( select b.company_name, b.dep_name, b.group_name, a.device_m_id, a.devicetype, a.machine_no, c.pbox_id from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_PBOX_INFO c on c.dev_id = a.device_id left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_COLLECTOR_PROGRAM d on c.collector_program_id = d.id where dep_name like '%COB%' and a.devicetype in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')),
tb as ( select distinct eqid from QT_MODEL_MES.T_PARAMETER_RESULT
and ask_date > minutes_sub(now(), 5) and device_type in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM'))
select company_name, dep_name, group_name, device_m_id, devicetype, machine_no, pbox_id from ta a
a.device_m_id not in (select eqid from tb) and company_name = #{factoryName} and group_name = #{groupName} and devicetype = #{deviceType}

with ta as ( select b.company_name, b.dep_name, b.group_name, a.device_m_id, a.devicename, a.devicetype, a.machine_no, c.pbox_id from QT_MODEL_EMS.T_DEVICE_CALCGD1JH1U82GWWIONK a left join QT_MODEL_EMS.V_CODE_NAME b on a.hierarchy_code = b.hierarchy_show_code left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_PBOX_INFO c on c.dev_id = a.device_id left join QT_MODEL_EMS.T_COLLECTOR_PROGRAM d on c.collector_program_id = d.id where dep_name like '%COB%'
and devicetype = #{deviceType}
and devicetype in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')
),
tb as ( select eqid, machine_no, is_valid, device_type, version, ask_date from QT_MODEL_MES.T_PARAMETER_RESULT
/* 近15分钟有采集数据上来的设备 */ ask_date > minutes_sub(now(), 5)
and device_type = #{deviceType}
and device_type in ('AA', 'WB', 'DB', 'HM')
),
tc as ( select distinct eqid from tb),
td as ( select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
count(1) offline_eqs from ta a where a.device_m_id not in (select eqid from tc) group by
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name)
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype)
),
te as ( select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
count(1) ttl_eqs from ta a group by
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name)
rollup (a.company_name, a.group_name, a.devicetype)
)
select case when a.company_name is null then '总计' else a.company_name end as company_name, case when a.group_name is null then '小计' else a.group_name end as group_name,
case when a.devicetype is null then '小计' else a.devicetype end as devicetype,
a.ttl_eqs, nvl(b.offline_eqs, 0) offline_eqs from te a left join td b on a.company_name = b.company_name and a.group_name = b.group_name
and a.devicetype = b.devicetype
